<style>
/* Import Google Fonts */
@import url('https://fonts.googleapis.com/css2?family=Dancing+Script:wght@400;700&family=Playfair+Display:wght@400;700&display=swap');

/* General Body Styling */
body {
  text-align: center;
  font-family: 'Playfair Display', serif;
  background-color: #f8f9fa;
  color: #333;
  margin: 0;
  padding: 0;
}

/* Main Title Styling */
.main-title {
  background: linear-gradient(135deg, #c9d6ff, #e2e2e2);
  padding: 50px 20px;
  border-bottom: 3px solid #2c3e50;
  font-family: 'Dancing Script', cursive;
  font-size: 4.5em;
  font-weight: bold;
  color: #2c3e50;
  text-shadow: 2px 2px #bdc3c7;
  margin: 0;
}

.subtitle {
  font-family: 'Playfair Display', serif;
  font-size: 1.5em;
  color: #2c3e50;
  margin-top: 10px;
  margin-bottom: 30px;
}

/* Section Titles */
h2 {
  font-family: 'Dancing Script', cursive;
  font-size: 3em;
  color: #2c3e50;
  margin-bottom: 10px;
}

h3 {
  font-family: 'Playfair Display', serif;
  font-size: 1.8em;
  color: #34495e;
  margin-top: 20px;
}

/* Container Styling */
.container {
  margin: auto;
  padding: 20px;
  max-width: 600px;
  background: #ffffff;
  border-radius: 10px;
  box-shadow: 0 4px 10px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.1);
}

/* Divider Line Styling */
hr {
  border: 0;
  height: 1px;
  background: #34495e;
  margin: 20px 0;
}

/* Image Styling */
img {
  border-radius: 10px;
  margin: 20px auto;
  max-width: 100%;
  display: block;
  box-shadow: 0 8px 15px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.2);
  border: 5px solid #ffffff;
  position: relative;
  transition: transform 0.3s ease, box-shadow 0.3s ease;
}

img:hover {
  transform: scale(1.05);
  box-shadow: 0 12px 25px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.3);
}

/* Link Styling */
a {
  color: #3498db;
  text-decoration: none;
  font-weight: bold;
}

a:hover {
  color: #2980b9;
  text-decoration: underline;
}
</style>
